definition[0]: an official visit to a place or person
definition[1]: an occasion when a parent is allowed to spend time with the children after a divorce, or the right to do this
definition[2]: an occasion when God or a spirit is believed to appear to someone on Earth
definition[3]: an event that is believed to be God’s punishment for something
definition[4]: a long visit from someone that you do not want to see – used humorously
